> mat=c(1,2,3,4,5,6,1,2,3,4,5,6,1)
> dtest <-xgb.DMatrix(matrix(mat,nrow=1))
> pred0 = predict(bst,dtest)
> pred0
 [1] 1.926683e-03 1.648408e-04 3.338370e-03 5.782917e-04 5.629804e-06 1.317317e-06 5.423048e-06 3.381684e-03 1.729874e-06
[10] 1.036003e-05 1.281435e-04 9.890141e-01 3.448038e-04 1.042568e-05 1.086802e-03 1.415264e-06
